item.title: SzopPrecz
item.description: Overview “SzopPrecz” (eng. Raccoon) is simple yet useful application for checking shops availability in Poland. Starting from March 2018, shops will be closed on some Sundays (enforced by law), which leaves a burden of remembering the schedule. Enter “SzopPrecz” — whether you’re a resident or just visiting Poland, it’s an easy way to check if shops are opened. Features: check shops availability for current day schedule notification for upcoming shops close down browse through the close down schedule for 2018 Coming Soon:
